name: Electivire
author: Nakaoka
flavor_text: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

poke_power.name: Intense Voltage
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), if Elekid is anywhere under Electivire, you may move a {L} Energy attached to your Pokémon to Electivire. This power can’t be used if Electivire is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.effect: You may discard all {L} Energy attached to Electivire. If you do, this attack’s base damage is 120 instead of 60.
